duck: Members of the French Academy of Sciences
Lennart Axel Edvard Carleson is a Swedish mathematician, known as a leader in the field of harmonic analysis.

Wolf | Prize (1992) }} 'Lennart Axel Edvard Carleson' (born 18 March 1928) is a Swedish mathematician, known as a leader in the field of harmonic analysis. One of his most famous achievements is his proof of Lusin's conjecture.
